Industry           Available Technologies    Technology Portfolio    NDAs    MTAs & SRAs    DEEP™ Ready-to-sign License    Licensing FAQs         Innovation Toolkit           Innovation Handbooks    Innovation Ecosystem    Awards & Funding Opportunities    Education Series         About           Impact Report FY 2019    Contact Us    Staff    Student Development    News    Events    General FAQs          Eyebrow menu    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Office of Technology Management    About    Student Development        Student Development  Our office engages undergraduate students, graduate students, and post-doctoral talent in a variety of activities related to the process of commercialization.       Technology Commercialization Analyst   Currently there are no technology commercialization analyst positions available.      (Graduate Assistantship / 20 hours per week)         (Graduate Assistantship / 20 hours per week)   Technology Commercialization Analysts participate in many aspects of the technology commercialization process, with a focus on screening new disclosures to the office and evaluating the commercial landscape. Working with the OTM provides valuable technology management and evaluation experience along with exposure to some of UIC’s most exciting technologies.  Commercialization analysts assist OTM technology managers in the assessment and marketing of technologies.  This involves performing preliminary market and industry analysis for the applications of new technologies, and performing prior art research for new technologies.  Commercial analysts also assist OTM technology managers with marketing activities for high potential technologies, and with generating lists of potential licensees.             Graduate Student Careers   Our Graduate students perform a number of duties, from finance patent searches and marketing research to business strategy. After graduation, our students have gone on to careers in the following fields.       Graduate Assistantship             call to action             Submit Your Idea!
